item.description:
Hi everyone,
I know this is super last minute, but I just came across a fascinating event posted for this evening. Dr. Kenneth Feder, an archaeology professor with Connecticut State University, will be giving a talk about the Mayan Calendar's Dec 2012 end date and the myths surrounding it's significance. There is a more colorful write-up on this meetup site:
http://www.meetup.com/cthumanist/events/85335942/

The event is at Kaplan Hall, room 101. Here is the map of campus:
http://www.newhaven.edu/about/3949/

Hope to see you there!
-Neil
203-928-9907
item.name: Mayan Calendar Archaeology Talk
